date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet(width = "100%", height = "500px")
m <- addTiles(m)
m <- setView(m, lng = 77.5946, lat = 12.9716, zoom = 10)
m <- addMarkers(
m,
lng = 77.5946,
lat = 12.9716,
popup = "Hello from Bangalore!"
)
m
```
